languages.text: "Каллигос, тебе стоило бы извлечь урок — так выглядит дворец настоящего Вольного Торговца. Не как ксенозверинец, пиратская сокровищница или — хотя тебе тяжело будет в это поверить — орбитальный бордель".

traits.locale_text: "Каллигос, тебе стоило бы поучиться. Так выглядит дворец настоящего Вольного Торговца. Не как ксенозверинец, пиратская сокровищница или — хотя тебе тяжело будет в это поверить — орбитальный бордель".

languages.text: "Calligos, you should take this opportunity to learn — this is what the palace of a true Rogue Trader looks like. Not like a xenomenagerie, a pirate's treasure hold, or — however difficult it may be for you to believe it — an orbital brothel."
languages.original_text: "Каллигос, тебе стоило бы извлечь урок — так выглядит дворец настоящего Вольного Торговца. Не как ксенозверинец, пиратская сокровищница или — хотя тебе тяжело будет в это поверить — орбитальный бордель".

traits.locale_text: "Calligos, you should take this opportunity to learn — this is what the palace of a true Rogue Trader looks like. Not like a xeno-menagerie, a pirate's treasure hold, or — however difficult it may be for you to believe it — an orbital brothel."

"Calligos, you should take this opportunity to learn — this is what the palace of a true Rogue Trader looks like. Not like a xeno-menagerie, a pirate's treasure hold, or — however difficult it may be for you to believe it — an orbital brothel."

"Calligos, you should take this opportunity to learn — this is what the palace of a true Rogue Trader looks like. Not like a xeno-menagerie, a pirate's treasure hold, or — however difficult it may be for you to believe it — an orbital brothel."

"Calligos, you should take this opportunity to learn — this is what the palace of a true Rogue Trader looks like. Not like a xeno-menagerie, a pirate's treasure hold, or — however difficult it may be for you to believe it — an orbital brothel."

"Calligos, you should take this opportunity to learn — this is what the palace of a true Rogue Trader looks like. Not like a xenomenagerie, a pirate's treasure hold, or — however difficult it may be for you to believe it — an orbital brothel."

languages.text: 「カリゴス、この機会に学ぶことだ。真の自由開拓者の宮殿とはこういうものだと。異種族の見世物小屋でもなければ、宇宙海賊の宝物庫でもない。お前には信じがたいかもしれないが、軌道上の慰安所でもないのだ」
languages.original_text: "Calligos, you should take this opportunity to learn — this is what the palace of a true Rogue Trader looks like. Not like a xenomenagerie, a pirate's treasure hold, or — however difficult it may be for you to believe it — an orbital brothel."

traits.locale_text: 「カリゴス、この機会に学ぶことだ。真の自由開拓者の宮殿とはこういうものだと。異種族の見世物小屋でもなければ、宇宙海賊の宝物庫でもない。お前には信じがたいかもしれないが、軌道上の慰安所でもないのだ」

languages.text: “卡里戈斯，你真该好好学学才是，这才是行商浪人的宫殿该有的样子。而不是你那种异兽动物园、海盗藏宝洞，甚至有时候看起来像——恕我直言，像星轨上的娼妓窑子。”
languages.original_text: "Calligos, you should take this opportunity to learn — this is what the palace of a true Rogue Trader looks like. Not like a xenomenagerie, a pirate's treasure hold, or — however difficult it may be for you to believe it — an orbital brothel."

traits.locale_text: “卡里戈斯，你真该好好学学才是，这才是行商浪人的宫殿该有的样子。而不是你那种异兽动物园、海盗藏宝洞，甚至有时候看起来像——恕我直言，像星轨上的娼妓窑子。”

languages.text: «Calligos, debería aprovechar para aprender. El palacio de un{mf||a} verdader{mf|o|a} Comerciante Independiente tiene este aspecto. No es un xenozoológico, ni un tesoro pirata, ni, por mucho que le cueste comprenderlo, un burdel orbital».
languages.original_text: "Calligos, you should take this opportunity to learn — this is what the palace of a true Rogue Trader looks like. Not like a xenomenagerie, a pirate's treasure hold, or — however difficult it may be for you to believe it — an orbital brothel."

traits.locale_text: «Calligos, debería aprovechar para aprender. El palacio de un{mf||a} verdader{mf|o|a} Comerciante Independiente tiene este aspecto. No es un xenozoológico, ni un tesoro pirata, ni, por mucho que le cueste comprenderlo, un burdel orbital».

languages.text: « Vous devriez en prendre de la graine, Calligos. Voilà à quoi devrait ressembler le palais d'un véritable libre-marchand, et pas à une xénoménagerie, à un repaire de pirates ou, aussi incroyable que ça puisse paraître, à un bordel orbital. »
languages.original_text: "Calligos, you should take this opportunity to learn — this is what the palace of a true Rogue Trader looks like. Not like a xenomenagerie, a pirate's treasure hold, or — however difficult it may be for you to believe it — an orbital brothel."

traits.locale_text: « Vous devriez en prendre de la graine, Calligos. Voilà à quoi devrait ressembler le palais d'un véritable libre-marchand, et pas à une xénoménagerie, à un repaire de pirates ou, aussi incroyable que ça puisse paraître, à un bordel orbital. »

languages.text: "Calligos, Ihr solltet die Gelegenheit nutzen und etwas lernen – so sieht der Palast eines wahren Freihändlers aus. Nicht wie ein Xenos-Zoo, eine Piratenschatzkammer oder – auch wenn das für Euch kaum zu glauben sein mag – ein Orbit-Bordell."
languages.original_text: "Calligos, you should take this opportunity to learn — this is what the palace of a true Rogue Trader looks like. Not like a xenomenagerie, a pirate's treasure hold, or — however difficult it may be for you to believe it — an orbital brothel."

traits.locale_text: "Calligos, Ihr solltet die Gelegenheit nutzen und etwas lernen – so sieht der Palast eines wahren Freihändlers aus. Nicht wie ein Xenos-Zoo, eine Piratenschatzkammer oder – auch wenn das für Euch kaum zu glauben sein mag – ein Orbit-Bordell."

languages.text: "Calligos, bak da biraz feyzal. Gerçek bir Hür Tacir'in sarayı işte böyle olur. Zenoat bahçesine, korsan hazine deposuna ya da inanması güç olsa da yörünge genelevine benzemez."
languages.original_text: "Calligos, you should take this opportunity to learn — this is what the palace of a true Rogue Trader looks like. Not like a xenomenagerie, a pirate's treasure hold, or — however difficult it may be for you to believe it — an orbital brothel."

traits.locale_text: "Calligos, bak da biraz feyzal. Gerçek bir Hür Tacir'in sarayı işte böyle olur. Zenoat bahçesine, korsanların hazine deposuna ya da inanması güç olsa da yörünge genelevine benzemez."
